Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "v-once in component with v-for cause a performance error" (#6956) at vuejs/vue
Events.RelatedBody:
### Version
2.5.2

### Reproduction link
[https://codepen.io/Leesson/pen/bYbmZJ?editors=1010](https://codepen.io/Leesson/pen/bYbmZJ?editors=1010)

### Steps to reproduce
the link displays that component did not perform as its data source. but if you change the vue's version to 2.4.x, it does. 

### What is expected?
the list perform as its data source

### What is actually happening?
the list's price are all same

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "Vue removes tab character from spans" (#6951) at vuejs/vue
Events.RelatedBody: ### Version 2.5.2 ### Reproduction link [https://jsfiddle.net/50wL7mdz/72614/](https://jsfiddle.net/50wL7mdz/72614/) ### Steps to reproduce Add a span element containing a tab character somewhere inside the app element, like inside a paragraph, before the text to be indented. ### What is expected? The tab character should be left alone, thus being able to indent a given line. ### What is actually happening? Vue strips out the tab character from the span. --- I am using https://yabwe.github.io/medium-editor/ to edit content for my posts. When pasting in some code, it will contain tab indentations, which are transformed into `[TAB]`. Upon viewing what was saved, I came to find out Vue removes the tab characters from inside the aforementioned span tags, thus the code I pasted in loses all indentation.

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "router-link  点击下一页面再返回 白屏" (#6954) at vuejs/vue
Events.RelatedBody:
### Version
2.5.2

### Reproduction link


### Steps to reproduce
router-link 使用时  会出现 在当前页面滚动一下然后点击进入下一页面，再返回出现白屏，滚动下才会 出现内容，怎么处理呢？

### What is expected?
解决白屏，现在的页面代码把router-line 换成了a，所以避免这个问题，如果不换呢

### What is actually happening?
会出现 在当前页面滚动一下然后点击进入下一页面，再返回出现白屏，滚动下才会 出现内容，怎么处理呢？

<!-- generated by vue-issues. DO NOT REMOVE -->
